pages.text: $(li)Gorillas are big neutral mammals that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/jungle/jungle)Jungles$(/l).$(br)$(li)You will see them in big groups, with a Silverback Gorilla leading the troop.$(br)$(li)Silveback Gorillas also have more health and deal more damage than regular Gorillas.
If you stares at a Silveback Gorilla too long, it will initiate a bluff charge as an intimidation tactic.

$(li)Gorillas are tamed with $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/banana)Bananas$(/l), just drop them on the ground.$(br)$(li)Tamed Gorillas do not follow you, however they can be commanded to sit by right-clicking on them and transportable with a $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/lead)Lead$(/l).$(br)$(li)If attacked, Gorillas with help you with your enemies especially Silverbacks, are efficient at defending you due to their sheer strength.
